product_name: Pearl Izumi Sugar 3/4 Bike Tights - Women's
long_description: The Pearl Izumi Sugar 3/4 Bike Tights feature moisture-wicking performance fabric to help keep you cool and comfortable when the riding heats up. Ultrasoft Select Transfer fabric wicks moisture quickly and provides comfortable stretch for freedom of movement. Anatomic 6-panel design eliminates the inseam and potential pressure points. Comfortable silicone grippers at the leg openings help hold the tights in place. Aerodynamic form fit reduces wind drag. Pearl Izumi Sugar Thermal 3/4 Bike Tights sport reflective elements for visibility in low light.
short_description: The Pearl Izumi Sugar 3/4 Bike Tights feature moisture-wicking performance fabric to help keep you cool and comfortable when the riding heats up.
